text.tspan: National average learning outcomes for males, 2000 to 2016
National average learning outcomes for males, correspond to test scores across psychometrically robust international
Data source: Angrist, Djankov, Goldberg, and Patrinos (2021)
Note: Not all observations are nationally representative. See the source tab for more details.
